title: Donald Trump to chair meeting on Gaza as US says it expects ‘to settle this before the end of this year’ – Middle East crisis live
summary: US special envoy Steve Witkoff expresses confidence in reaching a resolution soon, stating, "we think we’re going to settle this one way or another." title: Tory chair says party would consider deal with Taliban to return Afghan migrants – UK politics live
summary: Kevin Hollinrake announced that the party might establish a returns agreement with a foreign country, emphasizing that their deportation strategy is significantly more comprehensive than that of the Reform party. The proposal highlights a robust approach to immigration control. This comes amidst ongoing discussions about managing illegal immigration effectively.

title: Thames Water agrees payment plan for £123m sewage and dividend fines
summary: Ofwat has granted a struggling firm additional time as it seeks funding to avert nationalisation. This decision provides the company with a temporary reprieve in its financial challenges. The firm aims to stabilize its operations and secure necessary investments.
